i want to know about anant ambani

Anant Ambani is an Indian business executive with Reliance Industries. He is the youngest son of Mukesh Ambani, India's biggest business tycoon and Reliance Industries' chairman. 

According to available information, Anant Ambani was born on April 6, 1995, or April 10 (the exact date is not certain). He serves as a Director on the Boards of Jio Platforms Limited since March 2020. 

Anant Ambani has been in the news for his struggles with health and weight gain due to asthma and the use of steroids. He has recently gotten married to Radhika Merchant.
